name: Six Consulting, Inc.
description:
Six Consulting is a minority owned Microsoft and Salesforce partner who design and build technologies that make every working day a better one. Our expertise lies in either rebuilding existing Salesforce and Microsoft technologies or even designing and building something from scratch based on the client’s requirements.
 
It’s said that there are only six degrees of separation and it was this idea of connection that inspired our name. We connect people to the ideas and technology that make every working day a better one. A big part of this is helping bring people together more effectively to collaborate and create. 
 
Our services include Content & Collaboration, Data Analytics, Mobile Collaboration, Cloud Enablement, Application Development and Management on .Net and the Sales and Service Cloud with Salesforce to name a few. 

 
READ MORE...
